TopicTitle: What episode should i produce next for "The Kerbal Show"

Articles.Content:
So i've been thinking, i have 2 episode ideas for next week. and both require about the same amount of work.

-Kerbal Vs. Kerbin; Idiots guide to surviving as a kerbal when your suplies in your command pod run out.

-Mun miners; Drew and Sharkalope go on a voyage to mine kethane on the Mun when something strange happens.

-None, i don't want to see anything more about a KSP 3D animated series; If you vote this option. then you don't want me to make the actually episodes of "the kerbal show"

So please, leave me your opinions.

And this is in general discussion because it's about something KSP related.

Kerbal VS wild...

My god.

That would be interesting.

Glad to see i'm getting responses.

well, i don't actually start producing until monday. so we'll see where the poles go.
I'm Kerbal Krylls, and this, is not water.
"Well, looks like I'm stranded on Mun for the time being..... Better drink my own piss!".
"Well, there's some water. but... One of those pesky "Gamecus Missing-fileacus" might have peed here. So i'm gonna drink my own!"

I'm probably gonna get in a lot of trouble with myself... but here's a leaked render from the scenes of KVW

"this here is grass. Grass has a little bit of water in it and provides little bits of nutrition. so eat as much as you can if you can't find anything else to eat"

Okay, where's the guy who said "None, i don't want to see anything more about a KSP 3D animated series."?

I'm just trying to get feedback here... that's all.

IMPORTANT! READ BELOW

Okay, so as promised i'll make Kerbal vs wild. but it's gonna take long than i had hoped (i'm just getting started with the props, sets, ETC.

BUT. that episode is going to wait. because this week, i'm gonna put out an entirely space themed short (about 1 minute). so i should have it done by wednesday, so i can work on Kerbal Vs. Wild thursday-friday (next week)
